discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
The content release version on the Panorama management server must be the same (or earlier) version as the content release version on any Dedicated Log Collectors or managed firewalls.
https://docs.paloaltonetworks.com/panorama/9-1/panorama-admin/set-up-panorama/install-content-and-software-updates-for-panorama/panorama-log-collector-firewall-and-wildfire-version-compatibility#id09d0b616-1197-4f80-be05-fdd7e75f8652

Selected Answer: A
You can't push "to Panorama"

choices.A: Before deploying content updates, always check content release version compatibility.
choices.C: Content updates for firewall A/A HA pairs need a defined master device.
choices.D: After deploying content updates, perform a commit and push to Panorama.
choices.B: Content updates for firewall A/P HA pairs can only be pushed to the active firewall.

questions.question_text: What is a recommended consideration when deploying content updates to the firewall from Panorama?

choices.B: audit logs to provide information of administrative account changes
choices.D: device group and template settings pushed from Panorama
choices.C: system logs to provide information of PAN-OS changes

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: D
Correct:

Exports the firewall state information as a bundle. In addition to the running configuration, the state information includes device group and template settings pushed from Panorama.

questions.question_text: Which information is included in device state other than the local configuration?

Based on the graphic, what is the purpose of the SSL/TLS Service profile configuration option?
//IMG//

choices.B: It defines the CA certificate used to verify the client's browser.
choices.A: It defines the SSL/TLS encryption strength used to protect the management interface.
choices.C: It defines the certificate to send to the client's browser from the management interface.
choices.D: It defines the firewall's global SSL/TLS timeout values.

change the logging action on the rule (override default settings)
intrazone-default has Log-Settings disabled by default

comments.content: key word is "default", Remember that in intrazone is disabled logging action and you cannot see any traffic log related. System log is not capable to show some log about traffic

System Log: Reviewing the System Log can provide insights into issues related to system operations, including problems with default rules and internal processing. It can help identify if there are any system-wide issues or errors affecting the traffic handling.
